message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_CATEGORY_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: The Results Category Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_CATEGORY_MANDATORY_REFERENCE
message.locale: The Results Category Reference must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_CATEGORY_REFERENCE_NO_SPACES
message.locale: The Reference must not contain any spaces.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESULTS_CATEGORY_REFERENCE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Reference entered is too long. Maximum allowed is 40.

message.name: ERR_FV_CATEGORY_ACTION_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: The Category Action Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_CATEGORY_ACTION_MANDATORY_DISPLAY_STATE
message.locale: The Category Action Display State must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_CATEGORY_ACTION_MANDATORY_URI
message.locale: The Category Action URI must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CATEGORY_ACTION_NAME_AND_STATE_COMBO_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Name, %1s, already exists for the State %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_CATEGORY_ACTION_INVALID_URI
message.locale: The URI, %1s, must be a valid URI format.
